title: Anzenhosho

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Protect a player at night, giving them powerful defense. If they are attacked, rampage at the house of the player you protected, attacking everyone except for Yakuza members.
- Alternatively, heal a player at night, giving them powerful defense and curing them of poison.
- Once per game, you may protect or heal yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional kill
- Factional chat
- Can skip your night to convert into a Yakuza Boss or Yakuza Killing, if there are no members of those subalignments.
- Cannot spawn regularly. Must be converted into.

desc:
Post 4097
*While bodyguard services are typically fulfilled by the Kobun, often times the Yakuza will hire an anzenhosho, or security guard, for their official establishments.*
